summary: Procedure for exporting key-framed animations of statics from 3DSMax, then altering them with NifSkope for use in-game as Idle animation or called with playGroup (once scripting becomes available).  NOT for skinned meshes.
descriptionHtml:
Procedure for exporting key-framed animations of statics from 3DSMax, then altering them with NifSkope for use in-game as Idle animation or called with playGroup (once scripting becomes available).  NOT for skinned meshes.

Let me know (via Comment or PM) if you have a better or easier way of doing this.

An example of this can be found in my Gokstad mod (the oars\' rowing animations):
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5432
author: SLuckyD
